thread.title: Roger Grobler

author: Roger Grobler
title: Roger Grobler
text:
Hi Janet
Just a quick note to say thank you for the great service once again. You guys run rings around my Australian bank. I emailed my relationship manager to get a Quote: , only to get an automatic message to say she moved and I have a new relationship manager, who promptly then had an out-of-office message telling me to call the call centre.
When are you starting a bank? Iâ€™ll be your first client.
In seriousness: You guys are great. Instills a lot of confidence and a real pleasure to deal with.
Kind regards
Roger
